I checked CVS for this build. It was thrown on a line of code that said:

part.reparent(folder.getControl().getParent());

This was located inside an "if/else" statement that no longer exists in head
(only the else portion exists now, in PerspectiveHelper.addPart). Fixed sometime
in the 3.1 cycle.
